subject: Business
title: Motivating Beyond Money
description: A quick win: understand Motivating Beyond Money.

hook.text: Google gave engineers 20% time to work on personal projects. Gmail, Google News, and AdSense were born.

buildup.text: Daniel Pink identified three intrinsic motivators: autonomy, mastery, and purpose.

discovery.text: After basic compensation is fair, more money adds little motivation. Purpose and growth matter more.

twist.text: Bonuses for creative work can actually reduce performance. External rewards crowd out intrinsic motivation.

climax.text: Patagonia's mission-driven culture attracts top talent at below-market salaries. Purpose is the premium.

punchline.text: Pay people fairly. Then give them meaning, growth, and freedom.

quiz.question: What are Daniel Pink's three intrinsic motivators?
